Hello my name is Nathaniel Pyle and I am a Data Scientist. I have recently
completed a Master's of Applied Data Science at the University of Canterbury in
Christchurch New Zealand.

## Education

Master's Degree in Applied Data Science at the University of Canterbury 2024

Graduate Diploma in Applied Management from Ara's Institute of Canterbury 2019

Bachelor of Arts in English from the University of Canterbury 2016


## Personal Interests

Some of my personal interests include chess, judo and physical fitness. I enjoy
integrating my personal interests with my passion for Data Science, such as 
analysing specific patterns in chess using specified machine learning algorithms 
to learn. 

Please feel free to have a look at my github repository [NathanielPyle](https://github.com/NathanielPyle/NathanielPyle.github.io)

## Contact Details

If you would like to contact me about my work or anything Data Science related,
